name: The Logo Shirt
description:
Ultra soft and insanely comfortable tri-blend material keeps the Savage Mountaineering's logo shirt feeling like your favorite t-shirt from the moment you first put it on.  Whether its Mountain Biking in Moab, or hitting the local bar after a day of work, the Savage shirt is made for people who live their life relentlessly.  The fabric is breathable and slightly stretchy, perfect for keeping you looking and feeling comfortable when you are hitting the trails or traveling around town.  It's friendship is always given, never taken.

This shirt is Athletic cut.

name: The Caveman Shirt
description:
Ultra soft and insanely comfortable tri-blend material keeps the Savage Mountaineering's Caveman Shirt feeling like your favorite t-shirt from the moment you first put it on.  Perfect for those who's hearts are in the mountains, but their day jobs require professional grooming.  The Caveman Shirt speaks to those who'd feel at home gutting a freshly caught fish to eat for dinner, bombing down a backwoods trail on a 29'r, while still being able to offer you sound stock market advice.  Not every Savage has to look like one, and for that person, this shirt is for you.

This shirt is Athletic cut.
